scripts.coverage: forge coverage --report lcov && lcov --extract lcov.info -o lcov.info 'src/*' && genhtml lcov.info -o coverage
scripts.deploy:contracts: npm run deploy:stable-token && npm run deploy:token && npm run deploy:pool && npm run deploy:yield-vault && npm run deploy:vault && npm run deploy:twab-delegator && npm run deploy:twab-rewards
scripts.deploy:config-contracts: npm run deploy:set-token-price && npm run deploy:set-stable-token-role && npm run deploy:set-token-role && npm run deploy:set-vault-role && npm run deploy:set-yield-vault-role
scripts.deploy:full: npm run deploy:contracts && npm run deploy:config-contracts
scripts.deploy:local: SCRIPT_RPC_URL=http://localhost:8545 SCRIPT_PRIVATE_KEY=$LOCAL_PRIVATE_KEY SCRIPT_SENDER=$LOCAL_SENDER npm run deploy:full
scripts.deploy:arbitrumSepolia: SCRIPT_RPC_URL=$ARBITRUM_GOERLI_RPC_URL SCRIPT_PRIVATE_KEY=$PRIVATE_KEY SCRIPT_SENDER=$SENDER SCRIPT_VERIFY=--verify SCRIPT_ETHERSCAN="--etherscan-api-key $ARBITRUM_ETHERSCAN_API_KEY" npm run deploy:full
